name: In Vein (awakescott)
description:
In Vein is a 2D survival shooter game. It was made During Design Week in 2020.

Your a white blood cell that is in a human body trying to shoot bacteria and cholesterol. The goal is to survival as long as you can!

Controls:

  • Control for Blue Bullet
  • Alt key for Orange Bullet
  • Arrow keys to move around.

My roles:

  • Player controller ( Coding )
  • Art lead
  • Project manager
  • Teacher ( taught my team member pixel art)
